Texto: 
positive anterior drawer sign.
surgery consult and consideration for surgery.
disruption of the anterior cruciate ligament.  no fibers are visualized.  edema within the bone.
anterior cruciate ligament tear
partial versus complete tear of the anterior cruciate ligament.
26 year old man who felt a pop in knee with a twisting injury.
